data.name: last_infos
data.value:
For logged in users, it is possible to save a search to review it more quickly next time.
The advanced search feature is now available (menu "others" or right click on the search button).

data.name: site_descr
data.value:
This small site is used to search for anime (🔞 included), series or movies on several different sites, streaming and / or downloading
P.S: The code 800 is not an error...

data.name: aide
data.value:
This page allows you to enter a search. From 3 characters of input, proposals are displayed according to the API responses.

The requests are made directly from the browser, the response time depends entirely on your internet connection.

The old version uses a more limited algorithm (no filter and only works for series, etc...) but is faster.

With a right click (or long press on smartphone) on the search button, it is possible to perform a multiple search which will allow to select several possible results (more detailed).
Please note that the item below does not work with a multiple search.

It is possible to set up searches with keywords:
  • series=>SEARCH: allows you to search only in the series/anime api
  • movie=>SEARCH: allows you to search only the api for movies or animated films
